text: Thomas James Kenny (born July 13, 1962) is an American actor and comedian. He is mostly known for being the voice of SpongeBob SquarePants in SpongeBob SquarePants. He has also done the voices of The Ice King in Adventure Time, The Mayor in The Powerpuff Girls, Lord Mission in Codename: Kids Next Door, Wheelie in The SpongeBob cartoon series, and Scout Master Lumpus in Camp Lazlo. ==Early and personal life== Kenny was born on July 13, 1962 in Syracuse, New York. He studied at the Bishop Grimes High School. He has been currently married to Jill Talley since 1995. They have two children, Mack (born 1998) and Nora (born 2003). The Kennys live in Studio City, California. ==Filmography== ==Awards and nominations== Year Award Category Film/TV Show Result 2001 Annie Award Best Outstanding Individual Achievement for Voice Acting by a Male Performer in an Animated Television Production (voice of SpongeBob) SpongeBob SquarePants 2008 Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production (voice of SpongeBob) 2010 Golden Raspberry Awards Worst Screen Couple (voice of Wheelie and Skids) (shared with Shia LaBeouf and either Megan Fox or any "Transformer") Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen Annie Award Best Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production (voice of SpongeBob) SpongeBob SquarePants 2011 Golden Raspberry Awards Worst Screen Ensemble (voice of Wheelie) (shared with the entire cast) Transformers: Dark of the Moon 2014 Annie Award Outstanding Achievement, Voice Acting in an Animated TV/Broadcast Production (voice of Ice King) Adventure Time 2015 Annie Award Voice Acting in an Animated Feature (voice of SpongeBob) The Spongebob Movie: Sponge Out of Water ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Annie Award winners Category:Comedians from New York (state) Category:Writers from Syracuse, New York Category:Singers from New York (state) Category:Actors from Syracuse, New York
title: Tom Kenny
